It's really just a question of form over function. Different strokes for different folks.
2010-10-16

You do realize ...

Ack & Nak is a web comic of satire. They focus on programming, disdain for corporate life, something about spiritual life, life in general, life in specific, unlife, low life, pre-life, and half-life. They do this because we do this because you do this. Smile :)
